titleStmt.title: A German diet, or, The ballance of Europe wherein the power and vveaknes ... of all the kingdoms and states of Christendom are impartially poiz'd : at a solemn convention of som German princes in sundry elaborat orations pro & con ... / by James Howell, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
